verses.verse: Therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> seeing we have<WG2192> this<WG5026> ministry,<WG1248> as we have<WG2192> received<WG1653> mercy,<WG1653> we faint<WG1573> not;

But have renounced<WG550> the hidden<WG2927> things of dishonesty,<WG152> not walking<WG4043> in craftiness,<WG3834> nor<WG3366> handling<WG1389> the word<WG3056> of God<WG2316> deceitfully;<WG1389> but by manifestation<WG5321> of the truth<WG225> commending<WG4921> ourselves<WG1438> to every<WG3956> man's<WG444> conscience<WG4893> in the sight<WG1799> of God.<WG2316>
But if<WG1499> our gospel<WG2098> be hid,<WG2572> it is hid<WG2572> to them that are lost:<WG622>

In whom<WG3739> the god<WG2316> of this<WG5127> world<WG165> has blinded<WG5186> the minds<WG3540> of them which believe<WG571> not, lest<WG1519> the light<WG5462> of the glorious<WG1391> gospel<WG2098> of Christ,<WG5547> who<WG3739> is the image<WG1504> of God,<WG2316> should shine<WG826> to them.
For we preach<WG2784> not ourselves,<WG1438> but Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> the Lord;<WG2962> and ourselves<WG1438> your<WG5216> servants<WG1401> for Jesus'<WG2424> sake.

For God,<WG2316> who<WG3588> commanded<WG2036> the light<WG5457> to shine<WG2989> out of darkness,<WG4655> has shined<WG2989> in our hearts,<WG2588> to give the light<WG5462> of the knowledge<WG1108> of the glory<WG1391> of God<WG2316> in the face<WG4383> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ.<WG5547>
But we have<WG2192> this<WG5126> treasure<WG2344> in earthen<WG3749> vessels,<WG4632> that the excellency<WG5236> of the power<WG1411> may be of God,<WG2316> and not of us.
We are troubled<WG2346> on<WG1722> every<WG1722> <WG3956> side, yet<WG235> not distressed;<WG4729> we are perplexed,<WG639> but not in despair;<WG1820>
Persecuted,<WG1377> but not forsaken;<WG1459> cast<WG2598> down,<WG2598> but not destroyed;<WG622>

Always<WG3842> bearing<WG4064> about<WG4064> in the body<WG4983> the dying<WG3500> of the Lord<WG2962> Jesus,<WG2424> that the life<WG2222> also<WG2532> of Jesus<WG2424> might be made<WG5319> manifest<WG5319> in our body.<WG4983>

For we which<WG3588> live<WG2198> are always<WG104> delivered<WG3860> to death<WG2288> for Jesus'<WG2424> sake, that the life<WG2222> also<WG2532> of Jesus<WG2424> might be made<WG5319> manifest<WG5319> in our mortal<WG2349> flesh.<WG4561>
So<WG5620> then<WG3303> death<WG2288> works<WG1754> in us, but life<WG2222> in you.

We having<WG2192> the same<WG846> spirit<WG4151> of faith,<WG4102> according<WG2596> as it is written,<WG1125> I believed,<WG4100> and therefore<WG1352> have I spoken;<WG2980> we also<WG2532> believe,<WG4100> and therefore<WG1352> speak;<WG2980>
Knowing<WG1492> that he which raised<WG1453> up the Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> shall raise<WG1453> up us also<WG2532> by Jesus,<WG2424> and shall present<WG3936> us with you.

For all<WG3956> things are for your<WG5209> sakes, that the abundant<WG4121> grace<WG5485> might through<WG1223> the thanksgiving<WG2169> of many<WG4119> redound<WG4052> to the glory<WG1391> of God.<WG2316>
For which<WG1352> cause<WG1352> we faint<WG1573> not; but though<WG1499> our outward<WG1854> man<WG444> perish,<WG1311> yet<WG235> the inward<WG2081> man is renewed<WG341> day<WG2250> by day.<WG2250>

For our light<WG1645> affliction,<WG2347> which<WG3588> is but for a moment,<WG3901> works<WG2716> for us a far<WG1519> <WG5236> more<WG1519> <WG5236> exceeding<WG1519> <WG5236> and eternal<WG166> weight<WG922> of glory;<WG1391>

While we look<WG4648> not at<WG4648> the things which are seen,<WG991> but at<WG4648> the things which are not seen:<WG991> for the things which are seen<WG991> are temporal;<WG4340> but the things which are not seen<WG991> are eternal.<WG166>
